name: Star Fox (itch)
description:
A 2D arcadey spaceship shooter. Pick your time to shoot, and avoid getting hit at all costs!

Modifications made:

  1. Players on shooting now slow down additively (to a cap), while the slow down itself decays over time
  2. Tweaked player and AI unit behaviours and values subtly, on a per-level basis
  3. Added third movement mode for third level - Track Player. These shooters then act as stationary turrets
